block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
ABT Building Products Corp., Neeneh, Wis., two million common shares. Merrill Lynch.
The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
ABT Building Products Corp., Neeneh, Wis., two million common shares. Merrill Lynch.
American Semiconductor Corp., Westborough, Mass., one million common shares. CS First Boston.
Amphenol Corp., Wallingford, Conn., 7.75 million common shares, 6.25 million in the United States and Canada. Merrill Lynch.
Boardwalk Casino Inc., Las Vegas, Nev., an initial public offering of 1.6 million common shares (3.2 million warrants). Investors Associates.
Breed Technologies Inc., Lakeland, Fla., 3.75 million common shares. Lazard Freres.
Butler Inc., $15 million of convertible subordinated debentures due in 2003, --/--/--. Thomas James Associates.
CAI Wireless, Albany, an initial public offering of 2.87 million common shares. Gerald Klauer.
Cirrus Logic Inc., Freemont, Calif., 3.13 million common shares, 2.53 million in the United States and Canada. Goldman, Sachs.
Concord Holding Corp., New York, an initial public offering of 2.1 million common shares. Bear, Stearns.
Global Privatization Fund, New York, an initial public offering of four million common shares. Kidder Peabody.
Harvey's Casino Resorts, Lake Tahoe, Nev., an initial public offering of 2.9 million common shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Hirsch International Corp., Hauppage, L.I., an initial public offering of 1.25 million common shares. Janney, Montgomery & Scott.
Intercapital Insured Municipal California Securities, New York, an initial public offering of seven million shares of beneficial interest. Dean Witter.
Intercapital Insured Municipal Securities, New York, an initial public offering of seven million shares of beneficial interest. Dean Witter.
LXR Biotechnology Inc., Richmond, Calif., three million common shares. D. Blech & Co.
Mainstream Data Inc., Salt Lake City, an initial public offering of two million common shares. Piper Jaffray.
Martin Marietta Materials Inc., Bethesda, Md., an initial public offering of 7.65 million common shares, 6.12 million in the United States. Morgan Stanley.
Morgan Stanley India Investment Fund Inc., New York, an initial public offering of four million common shares. Morgan Stanley.
Network Long Distance Inc., Baton Rouge, La., an initial public offering of one million common shares. Barron Securities.
Pet Food Warehouse, Minneapolis, 3.15 million common shares. Dain Bosworth.
Portland General Corp., Portland, Ore., five million common shares. Merrill Lynch.
Safety 1st Inc., Chestnut Hill, Mass., 1.2 million common shares. Prudential Securities.
SEK, Stockholm, one million Amex Hong Kong 30 index call warrants. Lehman Brothers.
SEK, Stockholm, two million Amex Hong Kong 30 index put warrants. Lehman Brothers.
Silicon Ltd., Israel, an initial public offering of 500,000 units, each representing two ordinary shares and one series A redeemable warrant. Oscar Gruss.

Skyline Multimedia Entertainment Inc., Brooklyn, an initial public offering of 1.2 million units, each representing one common share, one redeemable class A warrant and one redeemable class B warrant. D. H. Blair & Co.
Source: MCM CorporateWatch.
Ratings: Moody's/Standard & Poor's.
